data.oai_dc:dc: Seed and tuber production of Dicentra canadensis

Demographic census data collected for three Dicentra canadensis populations in Ohio during 2008 - 2011. Data were recorded in late spring, at the end of the species' growing season each year. This data file includes: life stages of individual plants at census time, number of seeds and clonal propagules (secondary tubers) produced per plant, and mass of primary tubers, as a measure of size of individual plants. Data for manipulative pollination experiments (supplemental pollination and pollinator exclusion) are also included.
